Summary: The negative reviews made me want to try  it
text:
I'm always looking for new K-cups, and I read all of the negative reviews for this brand. What impressed me was that every one of those reviews was answered by a company representative and appropriate compensation was offered to each buyer. So for that reason, I overlooked the negatives and decided to buy.

The coffee arrived at my front door the next day. So far, I have had no issues with coffee grounds and breaking K-cups. I'm certainly not a coffee expert, but I can honestly say that I am enjoying the Breakfast Blend--and the price was great.

Keep up the good work, and thanks for the great coffee.
